name: Hunter x Hunter
description:
"-Living with a virus is cool"

•This is not an ordinary visual novel that tells the story of twenty-three-year-old Ruruka Chan, who lived in her comfort zone, which consisted of paranoia and disappointment in life. But at one point, when despair is already consuming her head, a strange letter comes to the mail with some suspicious text file and since Ruruka lacked a virus on her PC for complete happiness, she installs it and eventually gets herself a non-ordinary friend with the name Retro Chan ヽ(・∀・)ﾉ

•You will live with Retro Chan for a couple of days before the Halloween party and the attitude of Retro Chan towards you will depend on YOUR choices, you can go out both for a good ending and for a bad one

•As the story progresses, you will be able to learn a lot more not only about Retro Chan, but also about Ruruka Chan!  

•17.11.2022 ATTENTION, THE BETA VERSION OF THE NOVEL IS STILL AVAILABLE, SO IF THERE ARE BUGS OR ANYTHING ELSE, IT WILL ALL BE FIXED!
